title: AI supercharges the challenges of discerning truth from fiction
description: In 2026, the biggest challenge for news consumers won’t be finding information — it will be figuring out what to trust and how to make sense of a deluge of competing narratives and facts. We at Pew Research Center have seen in our work that many Americans say they often encounter inaccurate news online and...
